parameter.name: from
parameter.description: The 'From' address of the message sender

parameter.name: cc
parameter.description: The recipient addresses of 'CC' (carbon copy) type

parameter.name: bcc
parameter.description: The recipient addresses of 'BCC' (blind carbon copy) type

parameter.name: replyTo
parameter.description: The email addresses to which to reply to this email

parameter.name: content
parameter.description: Body of the message in any format

parameter.name: contentType
parameter.description: Content Type of the body text

parameter.name: encoding
parameter.description: The character encoding of the body

parameter.name: attachments
parameter.description: The attachments that are sent along with the email body

parameter.name: contentTransferEncoding
parameter.description: Encoding used to indicate the type of transformation that is used to represent the body in an acceptable manner for transport
